text: Autrans is a village near Grenoble. About 1,541 people live there. It is a well-known ski resort. On 1 January 2016, it became a part of the new commune of Autrans-Méaudre-en-Vercors.Arrêté préfectoral 20 November 2015 == References == Category:Communes in Isère Category:Former communes in France
title: Autrans
